name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aurora: Productive and cozy new tab
name.zh_CN: Aurora：高效而舒适的新标签页

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free to define your new tab,add website icons,HD wallpapers,quick access to bookmarks,todo list,weather and history
short.zh_CN: Aurora 自由定义您的浏览器标签页，随心添加网站图标，高清精美壁纸，快速访问书签、待办事项、天气和历史记录

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aurora New Tabs gives you the freedom to define your browser tabs, add website icons, HD wallpapers, quick access to bookmarks, to-do lists, weather and history.

Aurora New Tabs strives to create excellent interaction and perfect UI interface, not only provides rich features, but also easy to use and highly free to customize as you like, so you can say goodbye to the dull and boring native tabs and bring you a new personalized experience to redefine your new tabs.

With Aurora's new tabs, you can get the following features.

High degree of editing freedom
40+ setting options, customize the layout as you like, and make your new tabs your own.

Easy management of frequently used websites
Integrate thousands of commonly used websites, add them with one click and manage them in batches.

Beautiful wallpaper change at will
Built-in a large number of high-definition wallpapers, you can also locally upload your favorite wallpapers, so that your new tab page is pleasing to the eye.

Super quick navigation
Your most frequently used websites can be added to the bottom of the shortcut navigation for quick access and efficiency with one click.

Efficient functional components
Several functional components are built in, including calendar, weather forecast, history, bookmark management, to-do list, etc. and are constantly updated to improve productivity.

Feature Grouping
You can set up different groups according to your habits, and under each group you can place website shortcut icons to improve productivity.

Search engine customization
Integrate several mainstream search engines, such as google, Baidu, bing, yandex, etc. You can switch to use any search engine according to your needs, and can intelligently associate search.

Cloud data backup
Register an account with your email address to enjoy cloud backup and multi-synchronization to ensure data is never lost.
long.zh_CN:
Aurora新标签页让你可以自由定义您的浏览器标签页，随心添加网站图标，高清精美壁纸，快速访问书签、待办事项、天气和历史记录。

Aurora新标签页力求打造优秀的交互和完美的UI界面，不仅提供丰富的功能，而且简单易用，并可以高度自由化随心定制，让您告别呆板无趣的原生标签页，给你带来的个性化新体验，重新定义你的新标签。

使用Aurora新标签页，您可以获得以下功能：

编辑高度自由化
提供了40+的设置选项，布局随心自由定制，您的新标签页您做主。

内置丰富主题
精心设计的精美主题，随意切换。

轻松管理常用网站
集成几千个常用网站，一键添加，批量管理。

精美壁纸随心换
内置海量高清壁纸，也可以本地上传您喜欢的壁纸，让您的新标签页赏心悦目。

超级快捷导航
您最常用的网站可以添加到底部的快捷导航，一键快捷访问，提高效率。

高效率功能组件
内置了多个功能组件，包括日历、天气预报、历史记录，书签管理、待办事项等，并持续更新，提高生产力。

特色分组
您可以根据您的习惯设置不同的分组，每个分组下可以放置网站快捷图标，提高工作效率。

搜索引擎自定义
集成了多个主流搜索引擎，google，百度，bing，yandex等，可以根据自己的需求，任意切换使用，并可以智能联想搜索。

云端数据备份
使用邮箱注册账户，享受云端备份多端同步，保证数据永不丢失。
